list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Integrate dlmalloced Added a per core optimised version (each thread allocs from its own mspace) Redone bundle to use lz4 frame compression, now compress/decompress on mass rather then each chunk

task.summary: Default task
Major work on connection expansion and block connections Refactor and reorg instances, constraits, actions etc. moved ps8 docs to lower case
Overlord major overhaul. Autoconnect pins and ports Verilog top scanning ports and parameter New Board/Pin framework Verilog Parameters in handled

Fixed definition matching too short names Added cpus catalogs Improved gateware definition pathing Added VexRiscV_smallest to catalog, added ability to customize verilog name and top module name Improved port handling for pingroup and clock instances Computed direction better (refine from inout to uni directional when possible) Xdc writes more info and only outputs used constraints
Added spinal pipelined memory bus to resources added buses to resource catalogs Improved directory handling to Toml and Yaml Better parameter handling, still too verbose and no arrays yet
Added spinal pipelined memory bus to resources added buses to resource catalogs Improved directory handling to Toml and Yaml Better parameter handling, still too verbose and no arrays yet

Updated sbt to use similar style across the chip Updated the chip scala to a style style and Added resetti chip Moved ikuy_utils to seperate git repro added + to runMain sbt process to enable fetch compile to work Constant is now number only and now a BigInt to enable unsigned 64 bit Fixed pathing for some cases in Edalize Removed module_name from gateware now is the actual name of the instance Added pmb ram chip Added ${name} to read verilog sources, and sbt action Added 64 bit decoder to toml and yaml. For unsigned 64 bit has to be a string Fixed module name decoding from VerilogModuleParser (now has to be exact) Removed incorrect warnings from Wire.scala due to automagic hook up
Missed resetti added file from last commit
Renamed NXMinterconnect to bus added Advanced Peripheral Bus from Spinal to catalog added PipelinedMemoryBus to APB Bridge to Spinal Added bridges catalog Fixed compile in Report.scala

Fixed use of boolean parameter (which isn't support yet) Uart APB control chip added Fixed Xdc generation error due to wildcard matching Fixed Top wires generation error due to wildcard matching Fixed pmb_to_apb parameter names Fixed pin group naming bug
Added Variant type with BigInt handling

Fixed sync timing not being default Fixed combintorial loops in vexriscv config Fixed clock pin standard Added multiple bus hookups Added own Variant type with BigInt support Utility to lookup string or array of strings PreConnect stage added Bus connections now work out connection count connection syntax for bridges and busses improved Standardised instance object creation WIP compiler generation new parameter syntax Parameter class removed

Buses now take array of address, size as input Instances can now optionally specify address and size else use generated ones Generate cmake scripts for boot roms Moved compiler script to resource file for better editing Generate cmake tool chain files for the compilers that it builds cpus now take a primary_boot tag to say they will boot the SoC cpus now take a triple element to say which compiler etc. they use WIP crt file for riscv32 metal cpus Edalize now has a function to update boot rom from compiled rom Support for bus consumer array and ram size in game Dummy bootrom main.c to check linking okay Not finished update and instance only cli driver linker script for riscv32 metal Our Variant supports toString TomlAction can now output arrays Removed UnconnectionTrait into Unconnected Moved bus connection to preconnect Fixed bus connection bug for direct non-prefixed ports

renamed some bus parameter to be more consistant Fixed issues with prep_rom and now issues the calls as require. TODO the naming of prop_rom calls is slightly hardcoded rams are now required to provide data including defaults from toml so prep_rom Added RamFillType enum, so far just zero and boot_primary. TODO file and other code renamed toml variant toString to toTomlString
Output clock period and waveform for constraint HACK: Added dont_touch as vivido is stripping things and I can't figure out why... Utils toDouble and lookupDouble
Finding my way around again after break
Added gateware register definitions and banks handling ReadTomlRegistersAction can read toml files produced by sbt into gateware Cleanup code analysis warnings
Begining of C Header output Moved distance matrix into game from Top fixed bug in Report

Base C Header implementation WIP Bridge address working Bus fixed and variable address fitter Distance Matrix no longer assumed tops are connected. Moved more in Distance Matrix Game now stores Distance Matrix and Wires Fixes to naming in the top file. pow2 and log2 in Utils
Copy CMSIS-SVD.xsd to project to validate our svd Add stdResources paths to Resources Object

Refactored parameters and attribute merging etc. Definition no longer have parameters, only gateware does. Instance merge all attributes, ports etc. Cpu and Bus Instance now use lazy variable and the merged attributes instead of custom constructor parameters
DistanceMatrix fixed added NonRoute flag and using negative numbers as markers Lots of work with C Header output Work on fixing hardware
New distancematrix and routematrix algorithm Now using Dijkstra shortest path algo Takes into account connection directions Better logging of DistanceMatrix and RouteMatrix
Fixed Game lookup (RAM etc.) due to directional connection now in use
Fixed board instance and directional connections

Moved board resource files Moved ultrascale+ docs Added clean ZynqMP PS8 gateware Added soc section to resources Added basic PMU def Improved verilog module parser using regex Tidied up C header paths Made report print each instance register banks Removed replicationCount and shared from connections Fixed/improved unconnected connecting logic Fixed improved wire connecting logic More attrib merging in a few places Clock now inherits attribs properly Defination Catalog can now include other catalogs Tidy and container fixes

Moved board resource files Moved ultrascale+ docs Added clean ZynqMP PS8 gateware Added soc section to resources Added basic PMU def Improved verilog module parser using regex Tidied up C header paths Made report print each instance register banks Removed replicationCount and shared from connections Fixed/improved unconnected connecting logic Fixed improved wire connecting logic More attrib merging in a few places Clock now inherits attribs properly Defination Catalog can now include other catalogs Tidy and container fixes

Major refactor of definitions, hardware, gateware and software classes Instance is now a interface, with ChipInstance being the parent to both Hardware and Gateware Instances Added mutable version of the utils toXXX previous software toml definition is now register and uses a resource subname Action system now outside of Gateware to be used by Software as well

source processor renamed to sources gic400 register definition updated a53 system registers added ipi buffer registers added pmu ecc local memory bus register added Serdes PLL registers added lib core added with aarch64 and microblaze support a53 ikuy_boot boot fsbl/rom added overlord SoftSource action for symbolic links overlord Template action for templated source file Software instances and output added cpu passed into actions for cpu specific sources

refactored dbg - now raw_print.h functions write to uart directly whilst debug_print use the osservices functions. ansi escapes moved to own file Some changes to internal_math.h to fix some compile in release errors osservice library added, pmu ip3i transport system added os is being developed in xmasdemo but provides debug prints and ddr block allocators so far. will be moved here once its more settled C compiling set to gnu2x for single arg static assert

Cpu per zynqmp cpu added to defs atomic wifth and bitop width added to defs zdma register enums added cpp + CPU flags to cmake default cmake toolchain renamed some ikuy_boot to more standard style Register enum facility added extern "c" added in lots of headers Print for a pointer added to osservices OsServer ddr payload added BitOps for C and C++ added Atomics for C and C++ added bitmap_allocator_single_threaded.hpp added and tested bitmap_allocator.hpp WIP assert now waits forever

Moved most software libraries to soft_src rearranged include/src of most software projects Added assert_msg macro Added zynqmp display port library added zynqmp dma library ikuy_boot now packages pmu_monitor code and uploads its to pmu ikuy_boot sets up a 720p RGBA framebuffer utils library busy_sleep for aarch64, string utils, c++ compile time hash basic gfxdebug code with vga screen print

Moved most software libraries to soft_src rearranged include/src of most software projects Added assert_msg macro Added zynqmp display port library added zynqmp dma library ikuy_boot now packages pmu_monitor code and uploads its to pmu ikuy_boot sets up a 720p RGBA framebuffer utils library busy_sleep for aarch64, string utils, c++ compile time hash basic gfxdebug code with vga screen print Added ANSI screen console Fixed some pmu interrupt problems due to fast interrupts Added aarch64 exception registers and logger to ikuy_boot

Text Console improvements Extra Standard Video Modes Some DP timing cleanup Rework of host interface to using timer ZModem now working via host interface pmu_monitor now has 8K stack not 16K pmu_monitor as hundred hertz timer rgba8 have temp buffer no alloca

Add String to binary, hex, octal and C style decoder (0x,0b, 0) Added download address to zmodem and dma each chunk Added monitor commands for download_at, sleep cpu, wake cpu and boot cpu Fixed bug in overload related to pathing programs
Fixed up cache system SYS -> SYSTEM change Added RECURSE to pmu CMakeLists.txt Added subdirectories to tidy in various places Added cpu wake and sleep to os services Added reset to pmu
Fix for incorrect A53 base address register A53 resets now down in WakeUp Fix for wrong "Unknown Command" and empty strings

Added musl_math software library Re-organising cpu register banks (WIP) Re-organising zynqmp and SOCs tomls Changed and fixed bit rotten board handling Redid ident to require (in most games) 3 seperates, also both name and Definition Ident useable from project files Implemented hardware max instances/max cores and address offsets Fixed to new way ports and pin matches CPU folders named after cpu type not name Refactored Containers Added hidden attribute to CPP core header Refactor DDR structure Added IoDefinitionType Support fraction frame rates in zynqmp display port Made DistanceMatrix print more verbose (hiding unconnected chips) Added isIsolated to DistanceMatrix to test for unconnected chips Added FetchBootData to pmu_monitor Added board as command line parameters to overlord Added prefabs support Changed how pingroups are defined (in a table in the board object) refactored os functions in pmu_monitor Added board ident to software macro system Write register lists without register banks that have been used Added graph output to Report (outputs a graphviz dot file of the project) Added Xilinx software library for using the MIT libraries
re-organised software Intoduced Kria kv260 board Added multi_core library with A53 implementation so far added WIP memory file

Added Sheredom's utf8 single header to core Made dbg library both target and host library added some LOG macros to print for back compat for al203 until I bring in a proper logger memory.c host version ported from al203 CORE_LOCAL uses host thread local identifier on host added a host only host_platform ported from al203 platform

Major clean up and refactor of software, with better support for host software host is getting closer to just be another 'cpu' target All libraries now live in libs, per cpu target (and host) lib_${CPU} folders have links to the actual folder (allows sharing of multiple platforms for multiple cpus) software definition now can select which cpu they work on Compiler generation is cleaned up and they go into programs_host (not deleted when regenerating) Removed the xilinx version of zynqmp display port Added my gfx_image library Added host_os (WIP) from my al2o3 libraries Added host_platform from my al2o3 libraries Added luau for host and seperated luau_vm for targets Added memory (WIP) from my al203 libraries Added tiny_dds + tiny_ktx + tiny_image_format Added vfile and vfile_memory from al203 libraries
Renamed hw lib to platform host_platform now integrated in platform, so less if($CPU == host) needed

memory has linear and stack allocators now memory tracking seperated and compiles on non host-platform mutex gains recursive capabilities slice added (TODO C Slice) tinystl -> tiny_stl Lots of cleanup of tiny_stl with allocator support resource_bundle + writer updated to new tiny_stl and use of stack allocator
Integrate dlmalloced Added a per core optimised version (each thread allocs from its own mspace) Redone bundle to use lz4 frame compression, now compress/decompress on mass rather then each chunk

MESSAGE.value: Copy CMSIS-SVD.xsd to project to validate our svd Add stdResources paths to Resources Object

Refactored parameters and attribute merging etc. Definition no longer have parameters, only gateware does. Instance merge all attributes, ports etc. Cpu and Bus Instance now use lazy variable and the merged attributes instead of custom constructor parameters
DistanceMatrix fixed added NonRoute flag and using negative numbers as markers Lots of work with C Header output Work on fixing hardware
New distancematrix and routematrix algorithm Now using Dijkstra shortest path algo Takes into account connection directions Better logging of DistanceMatrix and RouteMatrix
Fixed Game lookup (RAM etc.) due to directional connection now in use
Fixed board instance and directional connections

Moved board resource files Moved ultrascale+ docs Added clean ZynqMP PS8 gateware Added soc section to resources Added basic PMU def Improved verilog module parser using regex Tidied up C header paths Made report print each instance register banks Removed replicationCount and shared from connections Fixed/improved unconnected connecting logic Fixed improved wire connecting logic More attrib merging in a few places Clock now inherits attribs properly Defination Catalog can now include other catalogs Tidy and container fixes

Major refactor of definitions, hardware, gateware and software classes Instance is now a interface, with ChipInstance being the parent to both Hardware and Gateware Instances Added mutable version of the utils toXXX previous software toml definition is now register and uses a resource subname Action system now outside of Gateware to be used by Software as well

Moved most software libraries to soft_src rearranged include/src of most software projects Added assert_msg macro Added zynqmp display port library added zynqmp dma library ikuy_boot now packages pmu_monitor code and uploads its to pmu ikuy_boot sets up a 720p RGBA framebuffer utils library busy_sleep for aarch64, string utils, c++ compile time hash basic gfxdebug code with vga screen print Added ANSI screen console Fixed some pmu interrupt problems due to fast interrupts Added aarch64 exception registers and logger to ikuy_boot

Add String to binary, hex, octal and C style decoder (0x,0b, 0) Added download address to zmodem and dma each chunk Added monitor commands for download_at, sleep cpu, wake cpu and boot cpu Fixed bug in overload related to pathing programs
Fixed up cache system SYS -> SYSTEM change Added RECURSE to pmu CMakeLists.txt Added subdirectories to tidy in various places Added cpu wake and sleep to os services Added reset to pmu
Fix for incorrect A53 base address register A53 resets now down in WakeUp Fix for wrong "Unknown Command" and empty strings

Added musl_math software library Re-organising cpu register banks (WIP) Re-organising zynqmp and SOCs tomls Changed and fixed bit rotten board handling Redid ident to require (in most games) 3 seperates, also both name and Definition Ident useable from project files Implemented hardware max instances/max cores and address offsets Fixed to new way ports and pin matches CPU folders named after cpu type not name Refactored Containers Added hidden attribute to CPP core header Refactor DDR structure Added IoDefinitionType Support fraction frame rates in zynqmp display port Made DistanceMatrix print more verbose (hiding unconnected chips) Added isIsolated to DistanceMatrix to test for unconnected chips Added FetchBootData to pmu_monitor Added board as command line parameters to overlord Added prefabs support Changed how pingroups are defined (in a table in the board object) refactored os functions in pmu_monitor Added board ident to software macro system Write register lists without register banks that have been used Added graph output to Report (outputs a graphviz dot file of the project) Added Xilinx software library for using the MIT libraries
re-organised software Intoduced Kria kv260 board Added multi_core library with A53 implementation so far added WIP memory file

Added Sheredom's utf8 single header to core Made dbg library both target and host library added some LOG macros to print for back compat for al203 until I bring in a proper logger memory.c host version ported from al203 CORE_LOCAL uses host thread local identifier on host added a host only host_platform ported from al203 platform

Major clean up and refactor of software, with better support for host software host is getting closer to just be another 'cpu' target All libraries now live in libs, per cpu target (and host) lib_${CPU} folders have links to the actual folder (allows sharing of multiple platforms for multiple cpus) software definition now can select which cpu they work on Compiler generation is cleaned up and they go into programs_host (not deleted when regenerating) Removed the xilinx version of zynqmp display port Added my gfx_image library Added host_os (WIP) from my al2o3 libraries Added host_platform from my al2o3 libraries Added luau for host and seperated luau_vm for targets Added memory (WIP) from my al203 libraries Added tiny_dds + tiny_ktx + tiny_image_format Added vfile and vfile_memory from al203 libraries

More support for host programs Adding many of my old libraries and other bits from wyrd, yolk and al2o3 binify cadt host_os data_utils (lz4, crc32c, miniz) imageio (load and siave) lua bindings to image and imageio
Renamed hw lib to platform host_platform now integrated in platform, so less if($CPU == host) needed

memory has linear and stack allocators now memory tracking seperated and compiles on non host-platform mutex gains recursive capabilities slice added (TODO C Slice) tinystl -> tiny_stl Lots of cleanup of tiny_stl with allocator support resource_bundle + writer updated to new tiny_stl and use of stack allocator
Integrate dlmalloced Added a per core optimised version (each thread allocs from its own mspace) Redone bundle to use lz4 frame compression, now compress/decompress on mass rather then each chunk

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Integrate dlmalloced Added a per core optimised version (each thread allocs from its own mspace) Redone bundle to use lz4 frame compression, now compress/decompress on mass rather then each chunk
